'Bamboo shoots' or 'bamboo sprouts' are the edible shoots (new bamboo culms that
come out of the ground) of many bamboo species including [[Bambusa vulgaris]]
and [[Phyllostachys edulis]]. They are used in numerous Asian dishes and broths.
They are sold in various processed shapes, and are available in fresh, dried,
and canned versions.
wiki.title: bamboo shoot
